video_description:
Here is Apple's new iPad 3, and here is our full video review. We go over its design, its new Retina Display, its A5X processor and everything else. Enjoy.

Check out our Written Review: http://www.techboom.co.uk/ipad-3-review/

Follow on Twitter: http://bit.ly/zhLycq

Like us on Facebook: http://on.fb.me/xPfMFv

Join us on Google+: http://bit.ly/AiKXMh

Also Check out our Website: http://www.techboom.co.uk/

Apple iPad 3 Review
Apple iPad 3 Review
Apple iPad 3 Review

comments.text: Great review. However I did the math in connection with the screen size when watching for instance youtube videos on an iPad. If﻿ you watch a video (16:9 aspect ratio) in landscape mode you will have 25% "empty space" under and above the video altogether. Which is not a terrible situation. However, in portait mode, watching the same video will result in a 58% (!) loss of screen size. It makes the actual size of the video 6,67" diagonally.Even with retina display, it's just bad. Numbers don't lie.

comments.text: Q: How much is that retina display has been exaggerated? I know for a fact that some apps can't be displayed as perfect as the new retina.﻿ Yet, Apple says that reading a ebook from iTunes looks more clearer. But on the iPad 2, it shows the same quality. In other words, that retina is only good for small apps that are made for retina display. Not saying that retina is a gimmick, if anything, it's way ahead of it's time, bracing for new apps that can be viewed in retina display. Right?

comments.text:
It's a bit unfair to say people are whining about the overheating.

Yes, the battery is bigger, but the reality is that this thing can get quite HOT when using it for a while. 

Just because it's "beautiful" doesn't make the heat issue any better. Particularly for those of us who live in hot climates.

Saying that we "should take it back to﻿ the store" is a bit silly.  If we have to take it back to the store then that's a DESIGN issue. And it should be reviewed and marked down accordingly.

comments.author: c31192

comments.text:
Well, certain games are as big as 1Giga or even a little bit more (Myst, Exile)
Most graphical adventures are between 300 MB and 500 MB (i think of games like the new the new Monkey Island games)
Most (Good little) games are between 100 MB and 200 MB (Things like angry birds)
And the other tiny games are maybe as little as 50 MB
The pro apps will take up maybe 5 Giga on your device
You can always use iTunes and iCloud to sync what you want on your device.
I﻿ have 300 Giga of apps, Use iTunes...
comments.author: Tony Feuggelen

comments.text:
It is true that the apps are becoming much bigger than they used to be!
If you install Speak It! (GREAT APP) text to speech without internet, and you wan't to install all voices and languages it will take up maybe 6 Giga.
It all depends on how you are using your device...
If you can afford it, i would buy a 64 Giga version! Maybe wifi﻿ only...
